Package Objects

Class BoardObject

java.lang.Object
Objects.BoardObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Apple, Obstacle
public class BoardObject extends Object
The BoardObject class represents a generic object on the game board. It provides basic functionality and properties for game objects.

    • getBoundsSurrounding

      public Rectangle getBoundsSurrounding()
      Retrieves the rectangular bounds of the object's surrounding area. The surrounding area includes a margin around the object.

      the rectangular bounds of the object's surrounding area
